questionTitle: A girl who has blue eyes is a __________________ girl.
A cat which has long hair is a __________________ cat.
A white shirt without any spot is a __________________ shirt.
A film that breaks your heart is a __________________ film.
When an adult behaves like a child, he has a __________________ behaviour.
Somebody who is worth your trust is a __________________ person.
A cake which you make at home is a __________________ cake.
When you heat a needle until it is red, you get a __________________ needle.
A person who looks very sad is a __________________ person.
A man who has confidence in himself is a __________________ man.
